reviewText: I was so happy to get the fourth volume sent to me. This now officially completes my collection of the series. I have watched Get Backers with much enjoyment and have no problem looking back at it over and over.

None of the episodes within the limitless fortress deny you of the thirst for this great series. After already having enough fun for a year inside the first levels of the maze that is the limitless fortress Ginji, Ban, and the rest of the newly acquired team get even more fun. They come to a place inside the fortress with 6 doors but where do they lead? Each door leads to a new and well-rested opponent and trust me the battles are nothing nice. This is the beginning of the greatest battles in the Get Backer's series and each and every one of these episodes is action packed and leaves you wondering what's next.
